website_summaries.verdict: A formula that has qualities that customers love, although its tendency to develop a dry and thick consistency can be disappointing, as it becomes less effective as the tube ages.
pros: We love how evenly this mascara goes on lashes
Builds and lengthens without smearing or clumping
Apply it in the morning and it will wear all day long
cons: The trade off of the "gloop-free" formula is that the consistency is on the dry side, which gets dryer and thicker with frequent use

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara on the market!
customer_reviews.text: As far as the product goes, this is by far the best mascara I’ve ever had! It makes my lashes darker and longer than others, and never flakes. It doesn’t last nearly as long as others, but still worth every penny! I ordered it recently from amazon for the same price as Sephora but with free/prime shipping. It was here the next day! It even came with a cute little reusable pouch.
customer_reviews.author: NurseTT

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several Bbb Brown mascaras, and I like the brush in this one the best. My ophthalmologist said to buy this brand for my eye allergy issues.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I had received a mini of this when I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I had received a mini of this when I had my birch box subscription. I fell inlove. Yes it's a little expensive for mascara but it's soooo worth it. I don't mind spending the money on something if I know it's worth it and it def is with this one. Made my lashes so long and didn't clump. Miracle in a bottle as far as I'm concerned
customer_reviews.author: Sara!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Dried up mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara was dried out when I received it. I won’t return it because I fear that it would be resold to someone else after I have already used it. Don’t buy this product from this seller. I guess I should have read the reviews better as this seems to be a common problem but the price seems too good to be true. It was
customer_reviews.author: PAdw

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara I have ever used. In my late 20's, so I have used quite a few! This is the only mascara I like to use now. I have naturally short lashes, but with this they look super long and full. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara by far. Doesn't clump and makes lashes appear thick. Wish it wasn't so expensive. Lasts me two months.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Groob

customer_reviews.title: Dried out and old product
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this mascara twice from this company and both times the mascara seemed dried out and old. I usually buy this mascara from Nordstroms and there is definitely a difference in quality. I will not be ordering any products from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: lor

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara! Even just one coat makes a huge difference. Wears well, doesn’t flake, easy to remove. I will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: sbb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on lashes
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice when you first put it on but A lot falls/flakes off after a couple of hours. Whatever’s left isn’t easy to take off. If you leave it on when you sleep you wake up with raccoon eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Starfish Family

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY DRIED OUT DON'T PURCHASE FROM HERE
customer_reviews.text: I usually go directly to Sephora or Bobbi Brown when it comes to buying mascara, but took a chance and bought from here. I opened the mascara and went to use it; the brush was completely different and the ENTIRE tube was completely dried out. Not 1 drop of mascara came out. Very disappointed and hoping to get a refund or a new bottle sent my way since it's an expensive purhcase
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not buying this again. Is it an old product?
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase this item again. The tube appears dried out and very little goes on the lash.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Brisco

customer_reviews.title: One of my eyes starts tearing real bad. It is too small for the price and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an allergy. One of my eyes starts tearing real bad. It is too small for the price and nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: galinaqt

customer_reviews.title: Went on thick. Bursh not tapered.
customer_reviews.text: Though I would try it since I like-so many of her other makeup products. Was irritating to my eyes and very drying. I’m going back to my old stanby Lancome.
customer_reviews.author: Egadbookers

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Gives nice long lashes
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, goes on really smooth without clumping.It is not irritating to the eyes. I have tried so many other brands, and I think this is the best
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Heard great things about this product
customer_reviews.text: My sister swears by this mascara. She says it extends her lashes and does not smudge. I have not tried it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Good price good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great , good quality product BB . I would buy it again for this price !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Bad
customer_reviews.text: Smudges and wears off in a couple of hours. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... of mascara the Bobbi Brown stayes on my lashes better than any high end mascara
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different brands of mascara the Bobbi Brown stayes on my lashes better than any high end mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Bobby Brown products and this is no exception. I would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Eagles30

customer_reviews.title: Good Mascara, But Arrived without Box
customer_reviews.text: The mascara arrived without the typical packaging box, like it had been opened before. Have been using this mascara for a while and like it but the way it arrived, I am afraid to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hardig

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like how half way through the day there was black under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristena Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Makes eye lashes look grear.
customer_reviews.text: wonderful mascara really makes lashes look full it lasts all day deep black color will buy again better than what I use now.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stabler. Judith Stabler

customer_reviews.title: but I feel this mascara is the best and I will continue to buy
customer_reviews.text: I bit expensive for me, but I feel this mascara is the best and I will continue to buy. Goes on with one coat, not clumpy, and separates my lashes beautifully. Stays on all day with no smudging yet washes off with soap and water! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it arrived
customer_reviews.text: I always depend on Bobbie Brown brand for safety and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Korstad

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this Mascara... and its very easy to remove...
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara. I love Bobbi Brown products and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Mascara. I love Bobbi Brown products and this mascara is no exception. The mascara goes on smoothly and makes the lashes look longer and fuller.
customer_reviews.author: A_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Mascara showed up in a damaged tube and extremely dry
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered. Delivered quickly. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: smartypts

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara ever
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara ever - love it. Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: I was leary at first
customer_reviews.text: I've heard so much about Amazon having sellers that aren't selling the real deal in terms of make-up. But this is not the case with this mascara. It came quickly in the mail and I can vouch that it's the real thing. Love Bobbi Brown Mascara!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bobbi Brown is an excellent product! I had my order within days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this mascara! Arrived on time thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Koppenhofer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite mascara. It goes on so easily and really defines every lash. My eyelashes look so much fuller and thicker with just one application. And the best part is no clumping! One layer is perfect for a all day wear. Then adding another layer or two is perfect for a dramatic night-out look. The price is well worth it because I would honestly not leave the house without this mascara on. I will defiantly be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have lashes again!!
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G. I love this mascara! I got a free sample of it and I have not looked back! It may be a bit pricey, but it is worth every penny! I have very light and thin eyelashes to begin with and this product not only makes my eyes pop, but it doesn't flake, it stays on for EVER, it lifts and lengthens and most importantly, it helps me feel even more beautiful! I will never purchase any 'OTC' mascara ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Hanny

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: You can absolutely tell it is not the legit product or is expired. I LOVE this brand but I highly suggest going and getting the real product not here from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Kowalk

customer_reviews.title: Old Product
customer_reviews.text: The mascara I received was extremely old and dried out. When I pulled out the wand a huge dried up cylinder of mascara came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It gives a natural look to your lashes which I love. No clumping. I first bought this product on one of the home shopping networks. When I went to look for it again it wasn't being sold. Amazon, thank you for carrying this wonderful beauty product.
customer_reviews.author: joanne sereno

customer_reviews.title: Carefree but gives a pleasing full enough  lash effect
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara. It stays on well but it is easy to remove. This is my second tube and I have not found any mascara as carefree.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: It's an average mascara
customer_reviews.text: It's just an average mascara. Nothing great but nothing bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Take note of the size of this mascara. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY disappointed in this .2 ounce tube of mascara. Yes, that is ONE FIFTH of one ounce. I couldn't believe it when I opened the box and saw a tube as small as a sample, and for a whopping high end price.
customer_reviews.author: Pentimento

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MASCARA!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love! Feathery look. Not runny, not clumpy, just right! Separates and builds ands lengthens.
customer_reviews.author: K. Graf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Bobbi Brown! I use the on days that I want a more dramatic look.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth yerkes

customer_reviews.title: Like the Black tube version better
customer_reviews.text: Not the one I usually order, but I still like it. It's a little thick and clumpy, but easy enough to smooth out once applied.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Cosentino

customer_reviews.title: All day mascara
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for two years. I love it. I particularly like how well it stays on, yet before bedtime, it washes off. I use coconut oil for washing my face.
customer_reviews.author: JPW

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF  THIS SELLER:  Happy _ Shopping
customer_reviews.text: the product is fabulous. This seller sent me one that is: NOT NEW (NO box, as shown in pic) and also it STINKS LIKE SOAP! Buy from someone else
customer_reviews.author: Pat Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several mascaras. I love this one! It doesn't smear onto my face during the day!
customer_reviews.author: Tawn R Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever!
customer_reviews.text: No clumping!! Lasts well, doesn't smudge. Quality product worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janj

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Mascara seemed clumpier brand new out of the box than when previously purchased from a department store 😞
customer_reviews.author: Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: This is my second purchase of this mascara.. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this mascara...the first never smudged under my eyes but this does after a day of wearing. I'd still probably purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara clumps alot. For the price I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara I've ever tried. No clumping or flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Bobbi Brown Smokey Eye Mascara, No. 1 Black, 0.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: This creamy pigmented mascara builds volume lash by lash, as opposed to traditional volumizing formulas that create the appearance of volume by clumping lashes together.
feature_bullets: This mascara defines and curls even the tiniest lashes leaving a clump free silky finish
Helps smooth lashes for even more spectacular shape, coverage and volume
